channel.title: Speakers on Devops Gathering 2019 | March 11 - 13, 2019 in Bochum
channel.description: Recent content in Speakers on Devops Gathering 2019 | March 11 - 13, 2019 in Bochum

item.description: Niclas is a DevOps Engineer, Docker expert and open source maintainer. He accelerates deployment processes in IT projects and systems. With his expertise regarding GitLab/CI pipelines he is an outstanding expert in Continuous Delivery and Continous Integration.

As founder of the bee42, System Architect, DevOps Engineer, Apache Member, Apache Tomcat Committer, Infracoder and Docker In uencer, Peter can rely on a long-lasting and remarkable experience. With his skills he inspires not only the bee42 crew, but also our customers to top performances.
